Package Elements

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Elements.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the game holding all the information about the objects in the game. Such objects are: Player, Fruits, Other Pacmans, Ghosts, Blocks.
